item.title: Fucking My Little Sister, Part 1

item.title: The Woods, Part 1
item.description: Several days ago, I was sitting on my back deck enjoying the summer night air, when I heard a screen door open and close. I peeked over the railing and saw Ashley, my neighbor's 11 year old daughter. She held a battery lantern in one hand and her golden retriever in the other by a leash. I also noticed she had a backpack on. I looked at my watch and thought it was very odd for her to be out at 1am.

item.title: The Incident At Cherry Lake, Part 2
item.description: “Who are you Mister?” the young girl asked as she slowly approached Derick in the semi-dark bed room. item.title: Attitude Adjustment, Part 1
item.description: The smartly dressed young woman placed her bulging briefcase down on the sidewalk beside her and took a moment to carefully survey her destination. She stood at the base of a long flight of very wide marble steps, and looked at the broad front of the imposing three-story building with her large brown eyes shining in wonder. Built in a past age when things were intended to last a very long time, the old stone building still appeared very solid, as if it could last forever.
